attributes.action: Stop proposed T-charge within London’s Congestion Charge Zone on Classic Cars
attributes.additional_details: The T-charge – or toxicity charge – will cost owners of pre-Euro 4-standard petrol and diesel vehicles – broadly those built before 2005 – £10 each time they travel within London’s Congestion Charge Zone, despite historic vehicles being granted exemption from the forthcoming Ultra Low Emissions Zone. This extra charge should not be allowed to go ahead ..
attributes.background: Classic cars are a part of our heritage and should be accepted as such and not vilified for their age ..

rejection.details:
